channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?
item.description: We have faced fears, for more than 10 years, that the market is going to experience the kind of crash not seen in nearly a century.

item.title: The government shutdown is forcing investors to trade on faith. What they need are facts.
item.description: Investors are wary of stocks and earnings viewed through political fog.

item.title: ‘We don’t want to get into trouble’: Can we give our daughter a $30K wedding gift without involving the IRS?
item.description: “What is the best way to go about this?”

item.title: Our two daughters are struggling with student debt. Should we dip into our $1.8 million 401(k)s to buy them apartments?
item.description: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”

item.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
item.description: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be releas...

item.title: Musk calls proxy advisory firms 'corporate terrorists.' Why their power is growing in the stock market
item.description: What to know about the proxy advisors that hold sway over shareholder voting.

item.title: Bank of America names five stocks with more room to run before they report earnings
item.description: Bank of America says buy these five stocks before it's too late.

item.title: GM is overbought and AT&T is oversold after an active week of trading off earnings
item.description: CNBC Pro screened the S&P 500 for the most overbought and oversold stocks this past week, using their 14-day relative strength index, or RSI.

item.title: Starboard aims to unlock the value of Fluor's investment in nuclear tech company NuScale
item.description: Activist investor Starboard sees a chance to unlock the value of Fluor's 39% stake in NuScale Power, a developer of small modular nuclear reactors.

item.title: Elite bull market takes control again with the S&P 500 touching 6,800 for first time ever
item.description: The phase of the current bull market that pushed off the blocks six months ago is proving elite at refreshing itself with the briefest of respites.
